you have a 202305_JF_Cando_Category_list.pdf file 

creata a graaph structure

- for each row create a node, based on the following columns


No. - this is identifier of the specific can do 
種別 - this is reference 
種類 - this is a type in the JF model of communicative language competences and activities   
レベル - this is level category CEFR
言語活動 - this is linguistic type of activity
カテゴリー - this is a subcategory of activity 
第1トピック - topic
JF Can-do (日本語) - description of can do in Japanese
JF Can-do (English)- description of can do in English

NODES: 
No. from No.  (id:No. )
種別 from 種別,  (id:種別 )
種類 from 種類 (id:種類, translation: <translate> )    
レベル - this is level category CEFR
言語活動 - this is linguistic type of activity
カテゴリー - this is a subcategory of activity 
第1トピック - topic
JF Can-do (日本語) - description of can do in Japanese
JF Can-do (English)- description of can do in English
